thread.title: Lufthansa pilots to strike Tuesday, Wednesday, hundreds of flights canceled
thread.title_full: Lufthansa pilots to strike Tuesday, Wednesday, hundreds of flights canceled

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Lufthansa pilots to strike Tuesday, Wednesday, hundreds of flights canceled
text:
Lufthansa pilots to strike Tuesday, Wednesday, hundreds of flights canceled   
Sep 07, 2015 eTN   
BERLIN, Germany - German pilots' union, Vereinigung Cockpit, announced that it will extend its strike at Lufthansa into Wednesday after a walkout already planned for Tuesday. 
Tuesday's strike, the 13th in 18 months, affects long-haul passenger and cargo flights out of Germany on Tuesday, while Wednesday's strike targets short-haul Lufthansa and Germanwings flights, it said on Monday. 
Lufthansa has cancelled almost half of its long-haul flights planned for Tuesday. It said it would operate 90 out of about 170 planned long-haul flights for Tuesday and all seven cargo flights thanks to pilots volunteering to work. It expects several hundred flights to be canceled on Wednesday, when it has 1,350 short-haul flights planned.
